name: Shang-Chi
text: Multiple Forms — You may include up to 3 copies of 1 [[ATTACK]] event from each aspect other than your chosen aspect. Meditate — Response: After you change to this form, shuffle a card from State of Flow into your deck.

flavor: "Every pilgrim's journey begins with but a single step. This, then, was mine. Countless more await me over the horizon...yet walk them I will."
name: Shang-Chi
text: Chi Mastery — Response: After you resolve a "[[Flow]]" ability, ready Shang-Chi.

name: Throat Punch
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 1 damage to the villain. Draw a card. Flow: [wild] → draw 2 additional cards.

name: Roundhouse Kick
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 1 damage to an enemy. Flow (attack): [physical] → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: Special Delivery
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. If this is the first event you have played this phase, confuse an enemy. Flow: [mental] → if this attack defeats an enemy, play the next [[ATTACK]] event from your hand at no cost.

flavor: "Another weapon. With it--I will take his eyes."
name: Dragon Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Flow: [energy] → this attack gains piercing, ranged, and overkill.

name: Chi Jabs
text: Hero Action (attack): Choose up to 3 different enemies. Deal 1 damage to each of them. Flow (attack): [physical] → deal 2 damage to the villain.

name: Augmented Blow
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 1 damage to a minion. Place 1 additional counter on an upgrade with any type of counters on it. Flow: [energy] → choose up to 2 upgrades with any type of counter on them. Place 2 additional counters on each of them.

name: Stark Nunchaku
text: Restricted. Enters play with 3 charge counters on it. Hero Action: Exhaust Stark Nunchaku and remove 2 charge counters from it → stun an enemy.

name: Metal Bracers
text: Shang-Chi gets +1 DEF. Enters play with 2 reflection counters on it. Hero Action: Exhaust Metal Bracers and remove 2 reflection counters from it → give Shang-Chi a tough status card.

name: Martial Mastery
text: Uses (3 chi counters). Hero Interrupt: When you use one of your hero's basic powers (THW, ATK, or DEF), exhaust Martial Mastery and remove 1 chi counter from it → your hero gets +1 to that power for this use.

name: State of Flow
text: Permanent. Setup. Forced Response: After you play an [[ATTACK]] event, place it faceup on top here, forming a pile. After the player deck runs out, shuffle each card placed here back into the player deck. Flow: Look at the top card here. If a printed resource on that card matches the resource required by the "[[Flow]]" ability, you may also resolve its effects.
